mapper.select: /* 대국민포털_DUR용량주의기본 조회 (DurCpctMapper.getDurCpct) */ SELECT cpct_cutn_sn ,mdcn_cd ,mdcn_nm ,gnrl_nm_cd ,gnrl_nm ,daily_max_admin_cpct ,daily_max_admin_crtr_cpct ,chck_crtr_igrd_con ,mfds_prdct_nm ,mfds_igrd_cd ,mfds_igrd_nm ,pbanc_ymd ,pbanc_no ,dtl_cn ,aplcn_ym ,type_cd ,rgtr_id ,reg_dt ,reg_prgrm_id ,mdfr_id ,mdfcn_dt ,mdfcn_prgrm_id FROM "KIDS_OWN"."TB_PP_M_DUR_CPCT" WHERE 1=1 AND cpct_cutn_sn = #{cpctCutnSn}
mapper.update: /* 대국민포털_DUR용량주의기본 수정 (DurCpctMapper.updateDurCpct) */ UPDATE "KIDS_OWN"."TB_PP_M_DUR_CPCT" SET mdcn_cd = coalesce(#{mdcnCd}, mdcn_cd) ,mdcn_nm = coalesce(#{mdcnNm}, mdcn_nm) ,gnrl_nm_cd = coalesce(#{gnrlNmCd}, gnrl_nm_cd) ,gnrl_nm = coalesce(#{gnrlNm}, gnrl_nm) ,daily_max_admin_cpct = coalesce(#{dailyMaxAdminCpct}, daily_max_admin_cpct) ,daily_max_admin_crtr_cpct = coalesce(#{dailyMaxAdminCrtrCpct}, daily_max_admin_crtr_cpct) ,chck_crtr_igrd_con = coalesce(#{chckCrtrIgrdCon}, chck_crtr_igrd_con) ,mfds_prdct_nm = coalesce(#{mfdsPrdctNm}, mfds_prdct_nm) ,mfds_igrd_cd = coalesce(#{mfdsIgrdCd}, mfds_igrd_cd) ,mfds_igrd_nm = coalesce(#{mfdsIgrdNm}, mfds_igrd_nm) ,pbanc_ymd = coalesce(#{pbancYmd}, pbanc_ymd) ,pbanc_no = coalesce(#{pbancNo}, pbanc_no) ,dtl_cn = coalesce(#{dtlCn}, dtl_cn) ,aplcn_ym = coalesce(#{aplcnYm}, aplcn_ym) ,type_cd = coalesce(#{typeCd}, type_cd) ,mdfr_id = coalesce(#{mdfrId}, mdfr_id) ,mdfcn_dt = now() ,mdfcn_prgrm_id = coalesce(#{mdfcnPrgrmId}, mdfcn_prgrm_id) WHERE 1=1 AND cpct_cutn_sn = #{cpctCutnSn}
